full_text:
I apologize, but the provided HTML does not appear to be a fact-check article. Instead, it looks like a job listings page for Code for Africa with various job opportunities. The content consists of multiple job postings for positions like Training Coordinator, Data Analysts, News Editor, and other roles primarily in African countries.

There is no fact-check article or report in this HTML content to extract. If you intended to provide a fact-check article, could you please resend the correct HTML?

Would you like me to help you with something else related to this job listings page?
title:
Hi John, thank you for your interest in working for PesaCheck. 

Here are the current opportunities at Code for Africa which is PesaCheck's parent organisation: https://opportunities.codeforafrica.org/

All the best.
vclaim: There is no fact-check article provided, as the input text appears to be about job listings at Code for Africa.
